channel.title: New AC/DC Album
channel.description:
I am looking forward to hearing what AC/DC can produce after 8 years out of the studio. It will be interesting to hear how much they have changed.
I still think that their best album so far is Back In Black, even though I think that Bon Scott was a better singer than Brian Johnson.
AC/DC will release their long-awaited new album Black Ice on October 18. It will be the band's first full-length studio album of new material in eight years.
The first single off the album, Rock 'n' Roll Train, will hit radio airwaves on August 28.
More info; http://www.news.com.au/technology/story/0,25642,24206005-5014108,00.html http://www.news.com.au/heraldsun/story/0,21985,24205300-2902,00.html

item.title: New AC/DC Album
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

This will probably be crappy. Their last album wasn’t good at all. Their old music was tons better.

item.title: New AC/DC Album
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

AC/DC is awesome and this will be awesome.

As for your lead singer comparison, you are exactly right. Bon Scott was singing in his normal natural voice. Johnson uses a fake shitty imitation voice. I like them though both lead singers.

Read full topic
